name: Slice of Life Project
description:
Slice of life Project by Night Games

First of all I want to emphasize that the only asset that is not my own is a character made in pixel art, 
this corresponds to the authorship of Hinayua (成人 済 腐).

Hinayua (成人 済 腐) Link: http://nijie.info/members.php?id=19864

Hello again, this time I am in production of my most recent project, 
I was with this idea for a few months ago, this first build took me by surprise 
because I thought it was not going to be ready by this time.

This first version is only for tests, if you find any fault, 
I would greatly appreciate if you let me know, 
you can publish it in the comments of the itch.io post, 
you can also contact me personally at klfranko.klfranko@gmail.com

Build 0.1 notes
* There is no tutorial
* You can only interact with the mouse and the interface
* There is a kind of minigame (this is in the process of improvement and expansion)
